about.seoTitle: About Us | Techno Lock Keys Trading
about.seoDescription: Techno Lock Keys is a leader in automotive locksmith solutions—keys, remotes, diagnostics, cutting machines, programming devices, fobs, transponder keys, and emulators.
about.ogTitle: Techno Lock Keys Trading — About Us
about.ogDescription: Trusted partner for automotive locksmiths worldwide. Discover our story, vision, and the solutions we provide.
about.creativeTeam: A Creative Team Driving Secure Mobility
about.securedBusiness: We build reliable, secure solutions for automotive locksmiths and workshops.
about.WasEstablished: Founded to make key programming and diagnostics simpler, faster, and more accessible.
about.hasBeenStriving: Since day one, we’ve focused on quality products, expert support, and fair pricing.
about.weWantToLead: We Aim to Lead with Innovation & Service
about.increaseMarket: Increase market coverage with curated products and strategic partnerships.
about.improveCustomer: Improve customer experience through faster delivery and localized support.
about.streamline: Streamline operations to reduce lead times and optimize costs.
about.imlpementEco: Implement eco-friendly practices across packaging and logistics.
about.FosterApostive: Foster a positive culture of continuous learning and customer centricity.
about.ourCompanyOffer: Global shipping, secure checkout, transparent pricing, and reliable warranties.
about.weAreSpecialist: Specialists in programming tools, software, and training resources.
about.weHaveTheExperience: Extensive range of OEM & aftermarket keys, shells, and remotes.
about.ifYouHave: Complete kits and guidance to recover from all-keys-lost scenarios.
about.weOfferSoftware: Up-to-date software, firmware files, and expert instructions.
about.weOfferSupport: Quick, multilingual support from experienced technicians.

contact.seoTitle: Contact Us | Techno Lock Keys Trading
contact.seoDescription: Get in touch with Techno Lock Keys for inquiries, support, and business opportunities. Find our contact details and branch offices worldwide.
contact.ogDescription: Reach out to Techno Lock Keys Trading for support, sales inquiries, and branch details across UAE, Saudi Arabia, USA, and Turkey.

deliveryinfo.seoTitle: Delivery Information | Techno Lock Keys Trading
deliveryinfo.seoDescription: Learn how orders are processed, packed, shipped, and delivered. Includes timelines, tracking, fees, and important notes.
deliveryinfo.ogDescription: Details on processing times, shipping methods, tracking, delivery windows, and support.
deliveryinfo.firstStep: Select your products and add them to the cart. Review quantities and variants before proceeding to checkout.
deliveryinfo.itTakes: After payment is confirmed, orders are verified and prepared within 1–2 business days. During sales or holidays, processing may take slightly longer.
deliveryinfo.shippingTime: Estimated shipping time depends on destination, service level, and carrier availability.
deliveryinfo.emailShipping: You’ll receive an email confirmation when your package ships.
deliveryinfo.makeSure: Please make sure your contact details and delivery address are accurate to avoid delays.
deliveryinfo.pleaseNote: Customs inspections or local courier backlogs can affect delivery timeframes.
deliveryinfo.storeVerify: Our team confirms your order details and payment, then schedules it for packing.
deliveryinfo.packed: Items are packed securely with protective materials to prevent damage in transit.
deliveryinfo.reliable: We ship with reliable, tracked services appropriate for your region.
deliveryinfo.customers: Tracking information is shared by email once the package leaves our facility.
deliveryinfo.mustVerify: Please verify package condition on delivery and keep your receipt for reference.
deliveryinfo.InCase: If you face any delivery issues, contact us with your order number and tracking code for assistance.
deliveryinfo.youWill: You will receive updates at key milestones—dispatch, out for delivery, and delivered.
deliveryinfo.weAreComitted: We’re committed to delivering your order safely and as quickly as possible.
deliveryinfo.OnlineStore: Delivery fees are calculated at checkout based on destination, weight/volume, and selected service.
deliveryinfo.theStoreMight: From time to time, we may offer free or discounted shipping promotions.
deliveryinfo.toFindOut: To see current offers, check the homepage or the banner at checkout.
deliveryinfo.localDeliveryTime: Typically 1–3 business days in major cities. Remote areas may take longer.
deliveryinfo.internationalDeliveryTime: Typically 5–10 business days, excluding customs clearance time.
deliveryinfo.PleaseNote: Please note: delivery windows are estimates provided by the courier.
deliveryinfo.checkSpam: If you don’t see our emails, check your spam/junk folder and mark us as safe.
deliveryinfo.willNot: will never request payments via email links. Only pay through our official website.
deliveryinfo.ifYouHaveAnyQuestion: If you have any questions, contact our support team—we’re happy to help.

privacypolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacypolicy.seoDescription: Read how Techno Lock Keys collects, uses, and protects your personal information on tlkeys.com.
privacypolicy.ogDescription: Our commitment to your privacy, data protection, and transparency.
privacypolicy.creditDebit: Payments are processed securely and we never store full credit or debit card details on our servers.
privacypolicy.websitePolicies: Our website policies, including this Privacy Policy and the
privacypolicy.mayBeChanged: may be updated from time to time.
privacypolicy.modifications: If material changes are made, we will update the “Last updated” date at the top of this page.
privacypolicy.someOfTheAd: Some advertisements or embedded services on tlkeys.com may be provided by third parties.
privacypolicy.thirdParties: These third parties may use cookies or similar technologies to collect information about your activities.
privacypolicy.pleaseRemember: Please remember that we do not control third-party sites or their privacy practices.
privacypolicy.theInformation: Information collected by third parties is governed by their own policies.
privacypolicy.weRespect: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data.
privacypolicy.theinfocollected: The information we collect may include contact details, order information, device data, and usage analytics to improve our services.
privacypolicy.weDontShare: We do not sell your personal information. We only share it with service providers for payments, shipping, support, and legal compliance.
privacypolicy.wePrioritize: We prioritize security and use industry-standard measures (encryption, access controls, monitoring) to safeguard your data.
privacypolicy.WeAre: we are transparent about how your data is handled.
privacypolicy.weEncourage: We encourage you to read this Policy carefully to understand our practices.
privacypolicy.mayContain: may contain links to external websites not operated by us.
privacypolicy.WhenYouAccess: When you access such links, their privacy practices apply.
privacypolicy.ifyouchoose: If you choose to disable cookies in your browser, some features of our site may not function properly.
privacypolicy.yourPrivacy: If you have questions about your privacy at
privacypolicy.ThankYouFor: Thank you for trusting Techno Lock Keys.
privacypolicy.ifYouHaveAny: If you have any requests regarding your data (access, correction, deletion), please
privacypolicy.trust: Your trust matters to us—we strive to keep your data safe and private.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.seoDescription: Read the terms that govern your use of tlkeys.com and our products and services.
terms.ogDescription: Clear terms covering accounts, purchases, intellectual property, and privacy.
terms.theseTerms: These Terms & Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of tlkeys.com and any services provided by Techno Lock Keys.
terms.byUsing: By using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms and all applicable laws and regulations.
terms.ourWebsite: Our website provides information and enables the purchase of locksmith-related products and accessories.
terms.youMayNeed: You may need an account to make purchases or access certain features.
terms.youAre: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for all activities under your account.
terms.youMust: You must provide accurate, complete, and current information and promptly update it when necessary.
terms.whenMaking: When making a purchase, ensure that billing, shipping, and contact details are correct.
terms.allSales: All sales are subject to availability, order acceptance, and our policies on returns and refunds.
terms.prices: Prices may change without notice; taxes, duties, and shipping fees may apply.
terms.allContent: All content on tlkeys.com (text, images, logos, product data) is owned by or licensed to Techno Lock Keys.
terms.YouMayNot: You may not copy, reproduce, or exploit content without prior written permission.
terms.weCollect: We collect and process personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
terms.ByUsing: By using our website, you consent to such processing as described there.
terms.IfYouHave: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us at

return.title: Return & Refund Policy
return.seoTitle: Return & Refund Policy | Techno Lock Keys
return.seoDescription: Read Techno Lock Keys' return and refund policy for purchases on tlkeys.com.
return.ogTitle: Return & Refund Policy — Techno Lock Keys
return.ogDescription: Key information about eligibility, partial refunds, exchanges, and shipping.
return.note: Note: For security-related electronics and sealed components, returns may be restricted once opened/activated, except for proven defects.
return.yourItem: Your item must be unused, in the same condition you received it, and in the original packaging.
return.TheItem: The item must include all accessories/manuals and the serial number must match our records.
return.ToComplete: To complete your return, a receipt or proof of purchase (order number) is required.
return.IfYou: If you installed, programmed, or modified the item, it may not be eligible for return.
return.anyItem: Any item not in its original condition, damaged, or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
return.anyItemThat: Any item returned more than 14 days after delivery (unless otherwise required by law).
return.onceYour: Once your return is received and inspected, we will notify you of approval or rejection.
return.WeWill: Approved refunds are processed to your original payment method within 5–10 business days.
return.IfYouAre: If approved but not received, check with your bank or card issuer; processing times may vary.
return.ifYouHave: If you have not received a refund yet, first check your bank account, then contact your card company.
return.ifyouhavedone: If you have done this and still have not received it, please contact us at info\u0040tlkeys.com.
return.damageorabused: Items damaged due to misuse, improper installation, or customer negligence.
return.ifthecustomer: Returns may be refused where incorrect order or compatibility information was provided by the customer.
return.itemscanbe: Items may be exchanged for the same model if defective on arrival, subject to inspection.
return.dependingon: Depending on your location, exchange delivery times may vary. Shipping fees are non-refundable unless the return is due to our error.

footer.about: Established in 1997, {company} has been your trusted locksmith partner for over two decades. We’re dedicated to professional, reliable solutions—from key cutting to advanced security systems—so your peace of mind stays our priority.
